events.message: The policyholder reported a collision involving their car hitting a streetlight last night around 8 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning a vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure all procedures are followed promptly.
We sent an acknowledgment email to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged car, and the driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
The customer provided completed forms, photos of the damage, and the police report as requested.
The investigation phase began to assess fault and verify the details of the vehicle accident claim.
Investigation concluded without discrepancies; fault assigned as per police report and witness statements.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental reimbursement was proposed to the policyholder.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the settlement terms proposed.
The claim was formally approved and authorized for payment issuance per the terms agreed.
Payment was issued promptly to cover damages, and confirmation was sent to the customer.
The claim process is now closed following successful payment and completed customer satisfaction.
All documents and records for this auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
